This folder contains all the third parties libraries on which LIQUID(r) depends:

Boost C++ - www.boost.org
GMM++ - www-gmm.insa-toulouse.fr/getfem/gmm_intro
hdf5 - http://hdf.ncsa.uiuc.edu/hdf5/
szib - http://hdfgroup.com/doc_resource/szip/
zlib - http://www.zlib.net/
wtl - http://wtl.sourceforge.net/
